name: taurean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person born during the period from 21 April to 22 May, who is believed to be influenced by the zodiac sign Taurus: "I'm a Taurean too," Larry said.
More examplesFewer examplesLuther Vandross was a smooth-voiced Taurean from New York City.He's a Taurean like me, and when we clash it's terrible.As a practical, steady Taurean you have no illusions about life.

belonging or relating to the zodiac sign Taurus (= the sign for people born from 21 April to 22 May): You will need your Taurean patience and diplomacy.
More examplesFewer examplesI always put my stubbornness down to my Taurean nature.You keep your practical Taurean feet firmly on the ground.Julius strode off to confront the intruder - there were times when he was so very Taurean.
